segments.advisor_message: That's great to hear! Just to make sure we capture everything, can you tell me the full name of your dependent and their date of birth?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah! My dependent's name is Jamie Smith, and they were born on the 15th of March, 2015. I'm just really excited about how much these investments can grow!

segments.advisor_message: Got it! And do you know how long Jamie will be considered a dependent for, or is there no specific end date?
segments.client_message: Well, I think it'll be until they turn 18, so probably until March 2033. I'm really looking forward to seeing how this all plays out!
